page.title: 05HOBBIES AND LEISURE
page.content:
In Okeford Fitzpaine there is a wide variety fo spare time occupations. The sample of people I asked was fairly small but also representative of the population in the village.
The most popular spare time occupation was watching the television. Many of the people liked to go for walks or cycling in the countryside surrounding the village. Another popular hobby was handicrafts, especially sewing and knitting among the ladies. Other popular hobbies included cooking, reading, riding and playing sports.
Some of the people I asked told me they had little spare time as they were out at work all day.
